summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons roster and set of transfer receipts for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 8, 2019. It includes a long list of inmates with their details and status codes, and specific transfer/release paperwork for several individuals, including Jeffrey Epstein. The document shows Epstein was in custody at MCC New York with a status of 'A-PRE' (likely present) as of that date. This document is a collection of U.S. Marshals and Bureau of Prisons forms from early August 2019, detailing prisoner remands, releases, and transfers at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It includes rosters, receipts, and release authorizations for multiple inmates, showing routine prison administration operations during this period.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Roster and Transfers
events.description: Bureau of Prisons roster snapshot and associated transfer/release/remand paperwork for inmates at MCC New York, including Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Transfer of Richard Pierce
events.description: Inmate Richard Pierce is transferred from MCC New York to Allenwood Low FCI.

events.title: Release of Ramel Logan
events.description: Inmate Ramel Logan is authorized for release from MCC New York via Good Conduct Time release.

events.title: Remand of Several Inmates
events.description: Multiple inmates (Camacho, Scales, Robles, Herrera, Salgado-Breceda, Jaquez) are processed into MCC New York via remand forms from arresting agencies.

events.title: Prisoner Receipt at MCC New York
events.description: Jairo Taveras was received at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York from the U.S. Marshals.

events.title: Prisoner Release - Johnny Jones
events.description: Johnny Jones was released from MCC New York via 'Try Trans' (likely try transfer).

events.title: Prisoner Release - Alan Pecorella
events.description: Alan Pecorella was released from MCC New York to an address in West Orange, New Jersey.

events.title: Prisoner Transfer - Jakeem Hargrove
events.description: Jakeem Hargrove was transferred from the custody of the Warden of MCC New York to USM/SDNY, with a status of 'HLD-REMOVE'.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate at MCC New York with register number and a status of 'A-PRE' on the roster dated August 8, 2019.
The document includes a transfer receipt for inmate Richard Pierce from MCC New York to Allenwood Low FCI on August 8, 2019.
A release authorization form shows inmate Ramel Logan was scheduled for release from MCC New York on August 8, 2019, at 9:00 AM.
Multiple Prisoner Remand forms show the intake processing of new inmates into MCC New York on or around August 8, 2019.
A 'Prisoner Remand or Order to Deliver' form from the U.S. Marshals Service orders the delivery of inmate Carlos Jaquez to MCC New York on August 8, 2019.
The documents show routine prison administration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York in early August 2019, involving prisoner intakes, releases, and transfers.
Multiple prisoners unrelated to the Epstein case are processed, indicating these are standard Bureau of Prisons and U.S. Marshals forms.
The documents include detailed rosters with prisoner names, register numbers, court designations (often SDNY or EDNY), and cell locations.
Two specific release authorizations show prisoners Johnny Jones and Alan Pecorella were released from MCC New York on August 8, 2019.
A transfer receipt shows prisoner Jakeem Hargrove was transferred out of MCC New York on August 8, 2019, with a 'HLD-REMOVE' status.
